body_html: I'm not sure what can we do about it short term. There's no guarantee that we can reliably represent int8 until we change char to signed char. It's fine to use such array in a constructor which will cast the memory
body_text: I'm not sure what can we do about it short term. There's no guarantee that we can reliably represent int8 until we change char to signed char. It's fine to use such array in a constructor which will cast the memory
body: I'm not sure what can we do about it short term. There's no guarantee that we can reliably represent `int8` until we change `char` to `signed char`. It's fine to use such array in a constructor which will cast the memory
